text: Which device trips on residual (leakage) current to enhance occupant safety?
ref: LV protection practices, coordinate with DEWA standards
explanation: RCCB/RCBO trips on residual current; MCB trips on overcurrent.

text: In TN-S systems common in Dubai, the protective conductor is:

choices.text: Combined with neutral in the same conductor
Separate from neutral throughout the installation

ref: Common LV earthing arrangements; DEWA practice
explanation: TN-S keeps PE separate from N; TN-C-S combines upstream then separates.
